MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G3 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.20pm to make emergency repairs to an underground cable outside 100 Yorkhill Street after 3rd party damage, and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.02pm on the 26th of November 2020.
